heisencraft.chemical.aluminium.descripti: A lightweight, silvery-white metal with good conductivity.
heisencraft.chemical.aluminium_oxide.des: A common ceramic material with high hardness and melting point.
heisencraft.chemical.aluminum_chloride.d: A powerful Lewis acid used as a catalyst in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.lithium_aluminum_hy: A powerful reducing agent used in organic chemistry.
heisencraft.chemical.bromine.description: A fuming red-brown liquid halogen at room temperature.
heisencraft.chemical.magnesium.descripti: A lightweight, shiny gray alkaline earth metal.
heisencraft.chemical.lithium.description: A soft, silvery-white alkali metal, the lightest solid element.
heisencraft.chemical.generic_ketone.desc: An organic compound characterized by a carbonyl group.
heisencraft.chemical.ethylene_glycol.des: A colorless, sweet, viscous liquid used as antifreeze.
heisencraft.chemical.dioxolane.descripti: A cyclic acetal commonly used as a solvent.
heisencraft.chemical.methylaminoacetone_: A chemical intermediate in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.diethyl_ether.descr: A common laboratory solvent and early anesthetic.
heisencraft.chemical.dimethylamine.descr: A gaseous secondary amine with a fishy odor.
heisencraft.chemical.oxalyl_chloride.des: A reactive acyl chloride used in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.diethylamine.descri: A flammable liquid with a strong ammonia-like odor.
heisencraft.chemical.nitrite.description: An ion that can contribute to acid rain formation.
heisencraft.chemical.zinc_chloride.descr: A white crystalline salt highly soluble in water.
heisencraft.chemical.iodomethane.descrip: A volatile methylating agent used in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.5_oxopentanoic_acid: A dicarboxylic acid with a ketone functional group.
heisencraft.chemical.glutaric_acid.descr: A simple dicarboxylic acid with five carbon atoms.
heisencraft.chemical.succinic_acid.descr: A dicarboxylic acid that occurs naturally in various organisms.
An acyl chloride derived from pentanoic acid.
heisencraft.chemical.nitromethane.descri: An organic solvent and explosive precursor.
heisencraft.chemical.nitroethylene.descr: A reactive nitroalkene used in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.cycloheptane.descri: A cyclic alkane with a seven-membered ring.
heisencraft.chemical.cycloheptene.descri: A cyclic alkene with one double bond in a seven-membered ring.
heisencraft.chemical.cycloheptadiene.des: A cyclic alkene with two double bonds in a seven-membered ring.
heisencraft.chemical.cycloheptatriene.de: A cyclic alkene with three double bonds in a seven-membered ring.
heisencraft.chemical.cycloheptanone.desc: A cyclic ketone with a seven-membered ring.
heisencraft.chemical.cycloheptylamine.de: A primary amine with a cycloheptane ring structure.
heisencraft.chemical.dimethylcyclohepten: A dimethylated amine derivative of cycloheptene.
A dimethylated amine derivative of cycloheptene.
heisencraft.chemical.tetraphosphorus.des: A molecular form of phosphorus consisting of P4 molecules.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphite.descripti: A phosphorus oxyanion and reducing agent.
heisencraft.chemical.dihydrogen_phosphit: The conjugate base of phosphorous acid.
An intermediate in phosphorus acid-base chemistry.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphorous_acid.de: A phosphorus oxyacid with reducing properties.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphate.descripti: A fundamental ion in biological systems and fertilizers.
heisencraft.chemical.dihydrogen_phosphat: The conjugate base of phosphoric acid.
An intermediate in phosphate acid-base chemistry.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphoric_acid.des: A common industrial acid and food additive.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphide.descripti: A compound containing the P³⁻ ion.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphorus_trichlor: An important reagent in organic phosphorus chemistry.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphorus_pentachl: A chlorinating reagent in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphorus_triiodid: A reagent used for converting alcohols to alkyl iodides.
heisencraft.chemical.phosphine.descripti: A highly toxic and flammable phosphorus hydride.
heisencraft.chemical.pyrophosphoric_acid: A phosphoric acid anhydride and chelating agent.
heisencraft.chemical.benzyl_alcohol.desc: A aromatic alcohol with a pleasant floral odor.
heisencraft.chemical.benzoate.descriptio: The conjugate base of benzoic acid.
heisencraft.chemical.nitrobenzene.descri: An organic compound with a nitro group attached to benzene.
heisencraft.chemical.aniline.description: The simplest aromatic amine, a precursor to many chemicals.
heisencraft.chemical.benzenediazonium.de: A reactive intermediate in diazonium chemistry.
heisencraft.chemical.phenylhydrazine.des: A reagent used in the formation of hydrazones.
heisencraft.chemical.3_nitrophenol.descr: A phenol derivative with a meta-nitro substituent.
heisencraft.chemical.3_aminophenol.descr: An aminophenol with the amino group in meta position.
heisencraft.chemical.3_hydroxybenzenedia: A diazonium salt derivative of meta-aminophenol.
heisencraft.chemical.3_hydroxyphenylhydr: A phenylhydrazine derivative with a hydroxyl group.
heisencraft.chemical.nortropane.descript: The parent structure of tropane alkaloids without N-methyl.
heisencraft.chemical.tropane.description: The basic bicyclic structure of tropane alkaloids.
heisencraft.chemical.benzoylnortropane.d: A nortropane derivative with a benzoyl group.
heisencraft.chemical.pseudotropine.descr: A stereoisomer of tropine found in some alkaloids.
heisencraft.chemical.ecgonine.descriptio: The base structure of cocaine and related tropane alkaloids.
heisencraft.chemical.mehtylecgonine.desc: The methyl ester of ecgonine, a cocaine precursor.
heisencraft.chemical.cocaine.description: A potent tropane alkaloid stimulant and local anesthetic.
heisencraft.chemical.benzyl_cyanide.desc: A toxic organic compound used in chemical synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.sodium_cyanide.desc: A highly toxic inorganic salt used in gold extraction.
heisencraft.chemical.pseudoephedrine.des: A stereoisomer of ephedrine used as a decongestant.
heisencraft.chemical.methamphetamine.des: A potent synthetic stimulant of the phenethylamine class.
heisencraft.chemical.n_methyl_1_phenylpr: An imine intermediate in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.hydroxyindole.descr: An indole derivative with a hydroxyl substituent.
heisencraft.chemical.3_carboxyethyl_dihy: A dihydroindole with a carboxyethyl group.
An indole derivative with chloroethyl substituents.
heisencraft.chemical.tryptamine.descript: A monoamine alkaloid and neurotransmitter precursor.
heisencraft.chemical.hydroxytryptamine.d: A tryptamine derivative with hydroxyl groups.
heisencraft.chemical.ketone8.description: A complex ketone structure used in synthesis.
heisencraft.chemical.methyl_hydroindolo_: A fused heterocyclic system with quinolinone structure.
heisencraft.chemical.methyl_didehydroerg: An ergoline derivative with hydroxyl and methyl groups.
An ergoline derivative with carbonitrile group.
heisencraft.chemical.lysergic_acid.descr: The precursor to various ergoline alkaloids.
heisencraft.chemical.ergoline.descriptio: The fundamental tetracyclic structure of ergot alkaloids.
heisencraft.chemical.didehydroergoline.d: An ergoline derivative with additional unsaturation.
heisencraft.chemical.lysergamide.descrip: The amide derivative of lysergic acid.
heisencraft.chemical.iso_lysergic_acid_h: A hydrazide derivative of lysergic acid.
heisencraft.chemical.iso_lysergic_acid_a: An azide derivative of lysergic acid.
heisencraft.chemical.iso_lsd.description: A stereoisomer of the psychedelic compound LSD.
heisencraft.chemical.psilocin.descriptio: The psychoactive compound found in psychedelic mushrooms.
heisencraft.chemical.mescaline.descripti: A naturally occurring psychedelic phenethylamine alkaloid.
heisencraft.chemical.thc.description: The primary psychoactive compound in cannabis.
heisencraft.chemical.olivetol.descriptio: An organic compound and key precursor in the synthesis of cannabinoids.
heisencraft.chemical.resorcinol.descript: A benzenediol isomer commonly used in resins, adhesives, and pharmaceuticals.
heisencraft.chemical.citral.description: A pair of terpenoid isomers with a strong lemon scent, used in perfumery and flavorings.
heisencraft.chemical.sbenzene.descriptio: A stereoisomeric form of benzene with inverted spatial arrangement, used in specialized catalytic processes and chiral synthesis.
heisencraft.reaction.sodium_amalgamizati: A powerful reduction where sodium amalgam liberates pure aluminium from its compounds.
heisencraft.reaction.aluminium_dissoluti: Aluminium metal readily dissolves in acidic solutions, liberating hydrogen gas and forming soluble aluminium ions.
heisencraft.reaction.sodium_cyanide_synt: Neutralization of lethal hydrogen cyanide gas with sodium hydroxide, yielding the soluble salt.
heisencraft.reaction.aluminium_alkaline_: Elemental aluminium is released in an alkaline aqueous reaction, generating hydrogen gas.
heisencraft.reaction.aluminum_chloride_f: Aluminium metal reacts vigorously with chlorine gas to form the versatile Lewis acid, aluminium chloride.
heisencraft.reaction.lithium_aluminum_hy: Direct synthesis of the powerful reducing agent LiAlH₄ from its constituent elements.
heisencraft.reaction.ethanol_dehydration: Ethanol loses a water molecule under acidic conditions, transforming into diethyl ether.
heisencraft.reaction.nitrate_reduction.d: Sulfur dioxide acts as a reducing agent, converting nitrate ions into nitrite through redox chemistry.
heisencraft.reaction.adipic_acid_pyrolys: Intense heating of adipic acid causes decarboxylation, yielding a mixture of lighter carboxylic acids.
Ethylene is converted to its valuable oxide precursor using hydrogen peroxide as the oxidizing agent.
heisencraft.reaction.oxalyl_chloride_syn: Ethylene glycol undergoes chlorination with dangerous phosgene to form the reactive oxalyl chloride.
heisencraft.reaction.methylaminoacetone_: Formation of a protective ketal from glycol and acetone, creating a key synthetic intermediate.
heisencraft.reaction.methylamines_synthe: Methanol and ammonia react over a zeolite catalyst to produce a mixture of methylamine, dimethylamine, and trimethylamine in reversible equilibrium.
heisencraft.reaction.acetic_anhydride_sy: Methyl acetate couples with carbon monoxide to form the essential acetylating agent, acetic anhydride.
heisencraft.reaction.nitromethane_synthe: Direct nitration of methane yields the simple yet energetic nitro compound, nitromethane.
heisencraft.reaction.nitroethylene_synth: Nitromethane condenses with formaldehyde to form the reactive nitroethylene monomer.
heisencraft.reaction.butadiene_telomeriz: Butadiene chains grow and incorporate carbon dioxide in a unique telomerization process.
heisencraft.reaction.pimelic_acid_cycliz: Pimelic acid undergoes ring closure to form the seven-membered ketone, cycloheptanone.
heisencraft.reaction.nitrobenzene_synthe: Classic electrophilic aromatic substitution: benzene is nitrated to form nitrobenzene.
heisencraft.reaction.aniline_synthesis.d: Nitrobenzene is reduced to the primary aromatic amine, aniline.
heisencraft.reaction.aniline_diazotizati: Aniline is converted to phenylhydrazine via diazotization and reduction.
heisencraft.reaction.benzenediazonium_re: Benzenediazonium salt is reduced to form phenylhydrazine.
heisencraft.reaction.phenol_nitration_me: Nitration of phenol selectively targets the meta position.
heisencraft.reaction.meta_aminophenol_sy: Meta-nitrophenol is reduced to yield the meta-aminophenol isomer.
heisencraft.reaction.meta_aminophenol_di: The amino group of meta-aminophenol is diazotized for further transformation.
heisencraft.reaction.benzoic_acid_synthe: Toluene is oxidized to yield benzoic acid.
heisencraft.reaction.benzoate_from_benzo: Benzoic acid is converted into a benzoate salt.
heisencraft.reaction.benzyl_cyanide_synt: Nucleophilic substitution: benzyl chloride reacts with cyanide to form benzyl cyanide.
heisencraft.reaction.phenylacetic_acid_h: The nitrile group of benzyl cyanide is hydrolyzed to yield phenylacetic acid.
heisencraft.reaction.phenylacetone_synth: Phenylacetic acid is converted into the key intermediate phenylacetone.
heisencraft.reaction.cycloheptanone_amin: Cycloheptanone undergoes reductive amination to form cycloheptylamine.
heisencraft.reaction.hofmann_degradation: Hofmann rearrangement shortens the carbon chain, forming a cyclohexane derivative.
Hofmann degradation of the cycloheptenylamine derivative.
heisencraft.reaction.cycloheptadiene_to_: Oxidation converts cycloheptadiene to the conjugated cycloheptatriene.
heisencraft.reaction.pseudotropine_synth: Ring closure and rearrangement forms the tropane alkaloid pseudotropine.
heisencraft.reaction.pseudotropine_to_ec: Structural rearrangement converts pseudotropine into ecgonine.
heisencraft.reaction.ecgonine_methyl_est: Ecgonine is esterified to form methylecgonine.
heisencraft.reaction.methylecgonine_benz: Benzoylation of methylecgonine yields the final product, cocaine.
heisencraft.reaction.phosphorus_trichlor: White phosphorus reacts with chlorine to form phosphorus trichloride.
heisencraft.reaction.phosphorus_pentachl: Excess chlorine converts white phosphorus into phosphorus pentachloride.
heisencraft.reaction.pi3_synthesis.descr: Red phosphorus reacts with iodine to form phosphorus triiodide.
heisencraft.reaction.pi5_synthesis.descr: Red phosphorus reacts with excess iodine to form phosphorus pentaiodide.
heisencraft.reaction.pi3_hydrolysis.desc: Phosphorus triiodide hydrolyzes to form phosphorous acid.
heisencraft.reaction.pi5_hydrolysis.desc: Phosphorus pentaiodide hydrolyzes to form phosphoric acid.
heisencraft.reaction.pi3_reductive_hydro: Reductive hydrolysis of phosphorus triiodide yields phosphorous acid and hydrogen iodide.
heisencraft.reaction.pi5_reductive_hydro: Reductive hydrolysis of phosphorus pentaiodide yields phosphoric acid and hydrogen iodide.
heisencraft.reaction.phosphoric_acid_deh: Phosphoric acid molecules condense, losing water to form pyrophosphoric acid.
heisencraft.reaction.pentachloride_hydro: Controlled hydrolysis of PCl₅ yields pyrophosphoric acid.
heisencraft.reaction.naughty_reaction.de: Condensation of phenylacetone with methylamine forms the imine intermediate.
heisencraft.reaction.iodoephedrine_forma: Ephedrine is converted to iodoephedrine via halogenation with hydrogen iodide.
heisencraft.reaction.iodopseudoephedrine: Pseudoephedrine is converted to iodopseudoephedrine via halogenation with hydrogen iodide.
heisencraft.reaction.meth_from_iodoephed: Reductive dehalogenation of iodoephedrine yields methamphetamine.
heisencraft.reaction.meth_from_iodopseud: Reductive dehalogenation of iodopseudoephedrine yields methamphetamine.
heisencraft.reaction.meth_from_amalgam.d: Reductive amination of phenylacetone using aluminium amalgam.
heisencraft.reaction.meth_crystal_precip: Crystallization of pure methamphetamine from solution.
heisencraft.reaction.fischer_indole_synt: Classic Fischer indole synthesis from phenylhydrazine.
heisencraft.reaction.fischer_hydroxyindo: Fischer synthesis yields a hydroxylated indole derivative.
heisencraft.reaction.hydroxyindole_oxaly: Hydroxyindole reacts with oxalyl chloride to form a keto-acid chloride.
heisencraft.reaction.tryptamine_synthesi: Synthesis of tryptamine from an indole precursor.
heisencraft.reaction.hydroxytriptamine_s: Synthesis of hydroxytryptamine from a hydroxyindole precursor.
heisencraft.reaction.tryptamine_methylat: Tryptamine is dimethylated to form the psychedelic DMT.
heisencraft.reaction.hydroxytryptamine_m: Hydroxytryptamine is methylated to form psilocin.
heisencraft.reaction.psilocybin_esterifi: Psilocin is phosphorylated to form the prodrug psilocybin.
heisencraft.reaction.carboxyethyl_indole: Fischer synthesis yields a carboxyethyl-substituted indole.
heisencraft.reaction.friedel_crafts_indo: Friedel-Crafts acylation on the indole ring system.
heisencraft.reaction.benzoindolyl_ketone: Amination of a benzoindolyl ketone intermediate.
heisencraft.reaction.indole_quinolone_cy: Cyclization forms the intricate indole quinolone structure.
heisencraft.reaction.indole_quinolone_re: Reduction of the indole quinolone carbonyl group.
heisencraft.reaction.alcohol_to_chloride: An alcohol is converted to an alkyl chloride using thionyl chloride.
heisencraft.reaction.chloride_to_nitrile: Nucleophilic substitution transforms an alkyl chloride into a nitrile.
heisencraft.reaction.curtis_reaction.des: Curtis rearrangement for constructing lysergic acid derivatives.
heisencraft.reaction.garbrecht_synthesis: Garbrecht synthesis of LSD derivatives from ergot precursors.
heisencraft.reaction.lysergic_hydrazide_: Lysergic hydrazide undergoes diazotization to form the azide.
heisencraft.reaction.lysergic_azide_to_d: The lysergic azide rearranges to form the diethylamide (LSD).
heisencraft.reaction.iso_lsd_epimerizati: Epimerization converts the inactive iso-LSD into psychoactive LSD.
heisencraft.reaction.cumene_process_2.de: A method of producing [destroy:phenol] and [destroy:acetone] by the {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:benzene] and [destroy:propene], via a {free radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}.
Acid-catalyzed rearrangement yielding resorcinol from a diisopropylbenzene.
Resorcinol condenses to form the phenolic compound olivetol.
heisencraft.reaction.thc_synthesis.descr: Olivetol cyclizes with a terpene to form tetrahydrocannabinol (THC).
heisencraft.reaction.butadiene_hydrocarb: Butadiene adds carbon monoxide and water to form pentenoic acids.
heisencraft.reaction.sodium_methoxide_fo: Sodium metal reacts with methanol to form sodium methoxide and hydrogen gas. This strong base is widely used in organic synthesis and biodiesel production.
heisencraft.reaction.hydrogen_bromide_sy: Hydrogen and bromine gases react to form hydrobromic acid. This direct combination reaction is highly exothermic and produces the acid in gaseous form.
heisencraft.reaction.pyrogallol_synthesi: Phenol undergoes hydroxylation with hydrogen peroxide under acidic conditions to form pyrogallol (1,2,3-trihydroxybenzene).
heisencraft.reaction.gallic_acid_formati: Pyrogallol reacts with carbon dioxide in a Kolbe-Schmitt type carboxylation to form gallic acid (3,4,5-trihydroxybenzoic acid).
heisencraft.reaction.trimethoxybenzoic_a: Gallic acid is methylated using dimethyl sulfate to form trimethoxybenzoic acid, protecting all three hydroxyl groups.
heisencraft.reaction.trimethoxy_nitrosty: Trimethoxybenzaldehyde reacts with nitromethane in a Henry reaction to form trimethoxy nitrostyrene, an important intermediate in organic synthesis.
heisencraft.reaction.mescaline_synthesis: Trimethoxy nitrostyrene undergoes catalytic hydrogenation with palladium catalyst to form mescaline, a naturally occurring psychedelic alkaloid.
ephedra_tooltip: §7A hardy shrub whose dry branches yield potent alkaloids. Handle with care.
lemongrass_tooltip: §7A fragrant grass with a sharp, citrus scent. Useful in extractions and teas.
peyote_tooltip: §7A small cactus, harboring powerful visionary compounds within its 'buttons'.
advancements.heisencraft.bicycle_day.des: Experience the effects of a special substance
